---
title: "R_Method for Data Visualization"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

Import Data
```{r}
data <- read.csv("penglings.csv")
head(data)
```

Plot
```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=5}
ggplot(data, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = species, size = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.8) +
  labs(x = "Flipper Length (mm)",
       y = "Body Mass (g)") +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("#fe9013", "#9932cc", "#018b8b")) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(order = 2), size = guide_legend(order = 1))
```
